import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import noteContext from "../context/notes/noteContext"; function AddNote() { const context = useContext(noteContext) const { addNotes } = context; const [note, setNote] = useState({ title: "", description: "", tag: "" }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); addNotes(note.t) } const handleOnchange = (e) => { setNote({ ...note, [e.target.name]: [e.target.value] }) } return (

Add a Note

) } export default AddNote
